function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Resurgence of tuberculosis","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased transmission in air","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dissemination of covid-19 cases shown on the map","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Direct and indirect spread of the covid-19 infection through respiratory droplets and fecal-oral routes.","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and
